QueryList.Join: <#if id??> <#if like??> and A.id like '%'||:id||'%' <#else> and A.id=:id </#if> </#if> <#if roleId??> <#if like??> and A.roleId like '%'||:roleId||'%' <#else> and A.roleId=:roleId </#if> </#if> <#if userId??> <#if like??> and A.userId like '%'||:userId||'%' <#else> and A.userId=:userId </#if> </#if>
QueryList.Query: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM UserRole A WHERE 1=1 @WHERE@
